post.description:
This end point will invite users by email or phone (or both)
it'll either find users that exist in the database and create a participant
object. If they don't yet exist, it will still make a participant object
with its corresponding email/phone.

application/json.message: Invalid field parameters, takes boolean fields isPublic, join, invite, suggest, decideGamePlan, and modifyRow.
You must be the creator, admin or an organizer to change the teeup status

post.description:
This updates the teeup's status must be one of the following
0 = Planning,
1 = its on,
2 = Happening,
3 = it's Ended,
4 = Cancelled

application/json.message: You must be a participant in the teeup

post.description:
This updates the teeup's status must be one of the following
0 = Invited,
1 = Might Go,
2 = I'm going,
3 = Interested,
4 = not going,
5 = on my way,
6 = arrived
